channel.title: Please help me with making a Staff login message
channel.description:
Hello, I'm getting some problems with making a staff loggin message on my [Pi] server (InsidiaX), i want to make something like this: http://prntscr.com/2fn161
I really hope you can help me. Thanks a lot!

item.title: Please help me with making a Staff login message
item.dc:creator: @th36utch3p1c th36utch3p1c
item.description:
@th36utch3p1c wrote:

I’m going to try it now thanks a lot !

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me with making a Staff login message
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

if (playerRights == *the owner rights on your server*){ for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("[Owner]" +Misc.optimizeText(playerName)+ " has logged in."); } } } [code]
